body_html:
The bazel command to cross-compile is as below:
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain
--cpu=armeabi-v7a

You also need to edit you WORKSPACE file to make sure the paths and versions of SDK and NDK are correct.
body_text:
The bazel command to cross-compile is as below:
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so 
--crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool 
--host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain 
--cpu=armeabi-v7a
You also need to edit you WORKSPACE file to make sure the paths and versions of SDK and NDK are correct.
body:
The bazel command to cross-compile is as below: 
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/contrib/android:libtensorflow_inference.so \
   --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool \
   --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain \
   --cpu=armeabi-v7a

You also need to edit you WORKSPACE file to make sure the paths and versions of SDK and NDK are correct.
